> It was pretty much straight..well as straight as I can get it with a
> hammer doing the sunobe.

ok, ta. Was just interested, Takano-san with my little kogatana got me 
to introduce a reverse curve so it ended up straight(ish) after 
yake-ire. I can imagine a Tachi many times the size of my effort curving 
significantly.

I bet the quenching was a hoot :-)
